belongs_to_collection.name: The Files of Young Kindaichi Collection

original_title: 金田一少年の事件簿 香港九龍財宝殺人事件
overview: Korean foreign exchange student Kim Yong-Dong (Seung-Ri) studies in Hong Kong and works part-time at a hotel. A murder then takes place in the hotel and Kim Yong-Dong is the prime suspect. Hajime Kindaichi (Ryosuke Yamada) works to uncover the truth.
title: The Files of Young Kindaichi: Lost in Kowloon
